name: MEC Vapour Overnighter Pack - Unisex
description: The designer behind the Vapour Series says "this is the coolest stuff I’ve ever made." Which is saying a lot, because he has designed some pretty sweet gear over the years. The Vapour Overnighter Pack is impressively lightweight, especially when you factor in that it’s made from burly nylon that’s completely waterproof (with fully taped seams, to boot). The internal divider keeps you organized while you’re travelling, and the padded back panel and shoulder straps keep you comfortable. A 15-inch laptop sleeve and dimensions approved by most airlines make it just right for going carry-on only on your next trip. Oh, and did we mention it looks super sleek? Because it totally does.Made of lightweight and supple 210-denier high-tenacity nylon with a waterproof TPU lamination.All seams are taped so water can't sneak in.Water resistant PU coated zippers help keep water out.Foam-padded back panel and shoulder straps have a stretch-woven fabric overlay for comfortable carrying.Access the main compartment through a water-resistant YKK clamshell zipper.Internal divider and zippered compartments keep you organized.Dedicated compartment with a water-resistant zipper and a brushed interior holds a 15in. laptop.Quick-access front pocket has a water-resistant zipper.Side lash loops let you clip on a water bottle, jacket or yoga mat.
